title: Hawkes process with tempered Mittag-Leffler kernel
abstract:
In this paper, we propose an extension of the Hawkes process by incorporating
a kernel based on the tempered Mittag-Leffler distribution. This is the
generalization of the work presented in [10]. We derive analytical results for
the expectation of the conditional intensity and the expected number of events
in the counting process. Additionally, we investigate the limiting behavior of
the expectation of the conditional intensity. Finally, we present an empirical
comparison of the studied process with its limiting special cases.
